name: Integrity and Credibility
description: We are conducting business according to the highest ethical principles, honesty, transparency, accountability and serving as trustworthy stewards of our resources.

name: Transparency
description: We are committed to transparency and accountability in our work and have procedures and guidelines in place for all critical processes.

name: Solutions
description: What makes us truly unique is our ability to develop workable solutions to the problems faced by neediest ïƒšcommunities.

name: Local participatory and Inclusiveness
description: CIDI believes local participatory and inclusiveness of variety of community groups is a cornerstone for sustainable changes.

name: Empathy
description: CIDI belief that, ethical and effective Services are the cornerstones of empathy and that empathy changes the world.

name: Partnership and / Networking
description: We believe in working in partnership and networking with other stakeholders to maximize services to communities.

name: Dependability
description: One can count on us to do what we say.
